layerItems.description:
OpenEmbedded-Core is a layer containing the core metadata for current versions
of OpenEmbedded. It is distro-less (can build a functional image with
DISTRO = "nodistro") and contains only emulated machine support.
layerItems.name: openembedded-core

layerItems.description:
This layer provides the Wind River Linux distribution definitions, 
distribution-specific integration and bug fixes, and other wrlinux components.
layerItems.name: wrlinux

layerItems.description:
This layer provides template processing support to OpenEmbedded.  Wind River
templates are a mechanism that permit various configurations to be enabled
with a simple setting.
layerItems.name: wr-template

recipes.description: This package contains scripts to find out if the build resultdiffers to a former build.
Convert svg file to tracing file (json), or merge multiple json files into one.                The svg file is from systemd-bootchart or 'systemd-analyze plot'
recipes.summary: Boot svg files to tracing format
U-Boot boot.scr SD boot environment generation for ARM targets
Service funtion to multiplex one or more serial ports and tty console devices

recipes.description: Example of how to run some postinstall and postrm operations to complete an upgrade with ostree
anspass is a daemon/client utility to save and retrieve     credentials by other utilities that implement the askpass interface.
recipes.summary: Credential storage for utilities that implement the askpass interface

recipes.description: An image with Anaconda to do installation.

recipes.description: The initramfs contains anaconda installer, which supports PXE install (net boot installation)
recipes.inherits: anaconda_image core-image image image-artifact-names image-postinst-intercepts image_types image_types_wic kernel-arch license_image nopackages overlayfs-etc populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrltemplate_i

recipes.summary: Basic init for initramfs to mount ostree and pivot root

recipes.description: This not a full theme for desktop environment, only includes                windriver branded desktop wallpapers and lxdm login theme.

recipes.summary: initramfs-framework module for resize rootfs on wic image

recipes.inherits: core-image image image-artifact-names image-postinst-intercepts image_types image_types_ostree image_types_wic kernel-arch license_image nopackages overlayfs-etc populate_sdk_base populate_sdk_ext qemuboot rootfs-postcommands rootfs_ipk siteinfo wrltempla

recipes.description: A list of commonly used native packages.

wrtemplates.description: Tune kernel options for reducing lantency for real-time kernel of host system
wrtemplates.name: feature/rt-latency-host

wrtemplates.description: Enable archiver class and original src mode
wrtemplates.name: feature/archiver

wrtemplates.description: Tune kernel options for real-time kernel for host system
wrtemplates.name: feature/rt-tune-host

wrtemplates.description: Add LAPACK and LAPACKE to the image
wrtemplates.name: feature/lapack

wrtemplates.description: This template allows the build to use the linux-dummy kernel, which provides no real kernel, but satisfies dependancies on virtual/kernel. This is useful when the build does not require a kernel, such as when building containers, saving build time as a re
wrtemplates.name: feature/empty-kernel

wrtemplates.description: Force users to update passwords when next time serial or graphical login
wrtemplates.name: feature/passwd-expire

wrtemplates.description: Tune kernel options for real-time kernel for guest system
wrtemplates.name: feature/rt-tune-guest

wrtemplates.description: Enable f2fs kernel options and user-space utility
wrtemplates.name: feature/f2fstools

wrtemplates.description: Add on-target package management to image
wrtemplates.name: feature/package-management

wrtemplates.description: Enable common Managed Build Project (mbp) settings
wrtemplates.name: feature/mbp-project

wrtemplates.description: Add gdb and gdbserver to image
wrtemplates.name: feature/gdb

wrtemplates.description: Tune kernel options for reducing lantency for real-time kernel of guest system
wrtemplates.name: feature/rt-latency-guest

wrtemplates.description: Add system and process monitoring utilities to the image
wrtemplates.name: feature/system-stats

wrtemplates.description: Enable systemd-bootchart and generate bootchart-*.svg and
wrtemplates.name: feature/systemd-bootchart

wrtemplates.description: Adds qt6 examples to the image
wrtemplates.name: feature/qt-examples

wrtemplates.description: Make all QA issues be errors
wrtemplates.name: feature/strict-qa

wrtemplates.description: Add sftp-server and the OpenSSH SSH server to the image
wrtemplates.name: feature/sftp-server

wrtemplates.description: Set the default syslog to sysklogd
wrtemplates.name: feature/sysklogd

wrtemplates.description: use podman and skopeo to support cosign based signed container
wrtemplates.name: feature/signed-container

wrtemplates.description: Adds additional qt6 modules to the image
wrtemplates.name: feature/qt-addons
